name: Cried in Tears
description:
'Cried in Tears'

The 1st part of 'Depressed Boys' series.

Inspired by people who cried in tears until they totally forgot that they cried too much. 
People usually forget to move and go from their sadness. They think, their depression are chaos for them. But, they won't let this depressed feelings go. 

Raise your hand. Whether it's left or right hand or both. And wipe your tears. You don't have to stay forever drowned on your own tears. You must get to keep going on. 

Someday you'll be forgotten of your own tears.
